title: "Google.org, nonprofit organizations to bring robotics programs to California schools"
excerpt: "Google.org, the Mountain View-based tech titan’s philanthropic arm, and the Robotics Education and Competition Foundation (RECF) have dedicated $450,000 to develop robotics and artificial intelligence programs for students in middle schools — generally, covering grades six through eight."
